author: Associated Press
title: Gov. Cuomo Says Preliminary Antibody Testing Indicates Far More New Yorkers Had Coronavirus Than Previously Believed
description: More evidence is emerging that far more New Yorkers have had the coronavirus than the number confirmed by lab tests, officials said Thursday.
content:
(NEW YORK) — More evidence is emerging that far more New Yorkers have had the coronavirus than the number confirmed by lab tests, officials said Thursday.
A state survey of about 3,000 people found that nearly 14% had antibodies, suggesting they had been exp… [+4589 chars]
